problem.markdown:
>>Please select the energy type that matches the description.<<
A non-depletable renewable source of energy: [[nuclear fission, natural gas, (the sun)]] A potentially renewable source of energy: [[the sun, (waste vegetable oil), wind]] A depletable source of energy: [[ algae, (coal), solar]]
[explanation] The sun is a non-depletable renewable source of energy, while waste vegetable oil is a potentially renewable source (it can be replenished, but also can be depleted). Coal is a depletable source of energy. [explanation]
